00021 #include <votca/ctp/qmapplication.h>
00022 #include <votca/ctp/version.h>
00023 
00024 
00025 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00026 
00027 QMApplication::QMApplication() {
00028     Calculatorfactory::RegisterAll();
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 void QMApplication::Initialize(void) {
00033     votca::csg::TrajectoryWriter::RegisterPlugins();
00034     votca::csg::TrajectoryReader::RegisterPlugins();
00035 
00036     Calculatorfactory::RegisterAll();
00037 
00038     namespace propt = boost::program_options;
00039 
00040     AddProgramOptions() ("options,o", propt::value<string>(),
00041                          "  calculator options");
00042     AddProgramOptions() ("file,f", propt::value<string>(),
00043                          "  state file");
00044     AddProgramOptions() ("first-frame,i", propt::value<int>()->default_value(1),
00045                          "  start from this frame");
00046     AddProgramOptions() ("nframes,n", propt::value<int>()->default_value(-1),
00047                          "  number of frames to process");
00048     AddProgramOptions() ("nthreads,t", propt::value<int>()->default_value(1),
00049                          "  number of threads to create");
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 bool QMApplication::EvaluateOptions(void) {
00054     CheckRequired("options", "Please provide an xml file with calculator options");
00055     CheckRequired("file", "Please provide the state file");
00056     return true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void QMApplication::Run() {
00061 
00062     load_property_from_xml(_options, _op_vm["options"].as<string>());
00063 
00064     int nThreads = OptionsMap()["nthreads"].as<int>();
00065     int nframes = OptionsMap()["nframes"].as<int>();
00066     int fframe = OptionsMap()["first-frame"].as<int>();
00067     if (fframe-- == 0) throw runtime_error("ERROR: First frame is 0, counting "
00068                                            "in VOTCA::CTP starts from 1.");
00069 
00070     cout << "Initializing calculators " << endl;
00071     BeginEvaluate(nThreads);
00072 
00073 
00074 
00075     string statefile = OptionsMap()["file"].as<string>();
00076     StateSaverSQLite statsav;
00077     statsav.Open(_top, statefile);
00078 
00079     while (statsav.NextFrame()) {
00080         cout << "Evaluating frame " << _top.getDatabaseId() << endl;
00081         EvaluateFrame();
00082         statsav.WriteFrame();
00083     }
00084     statsav.Close();
00085     EndEvaluate();
00086 
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 
00091 
00092 void QMApplication::AddCalculator(QMCalculator* calculator) {
00093     _calculators.push_back(calculator);
00094 }
00095 
00096 
00097 void QMApplication::BeginEvaluate(int nThreads = 1) {
00098     list< QMCalculator* > ::iterator it;
00099     for (it = _calculators.begin(); it != _calculators.end(); it++) {
00100         cout << "... " << (*it)->Identify() << " ";
00101         (*it)->setnThreads(nThreads);
00102         (*it)->Initialize(&_top, &_options);        
00103         cout << endl;
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 bool QMApplication::EvaluateFrame() {
00108     list< QMCalculator* > ::iterator it;
00109     for (it = _calculators.begin(); it != _calculators.end(); it++) {
00110         cout << "... " << (*it)->Identify() << " ";
00111         (*it)->EvaluateFrame(&_top);
00112         cout << endl;
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 void QMApplication::EndEvaluate() {
00117     list< QMCalculator* > ::iterator it;
00118     for (it = _calculators.begin(); it != _calculators.end(); it++) {
00119         (*it)->EndEvaluate(&_top);
00120     }
00121 }
00122 
00123 void QMApplication::ShowHelpText(std::ostream &out) {
00124     string name = ProgramName();
00125     if (VersionString() != "") name = name + ", version " + VersionString();
00126     votca::ctp::HelpTextHeader(name);
00127     HelpText(out);
00128     out << "\n\n" << OptionsDesc() << endl;
00129 }
